ParamAuthorName.Description: This will be added as a tag called 'Owner' to every resource for easier management.

ParamDatabaseInstanceType.Description: Instance type to be used for the DB instance

ParamDatabaseName.Description: Name of the database created in the cluster

ParamDatabasePassword.ConstraintDescription: Can contain only alphanumeric characters and must be at least 8 characters long.

ParamDatabaseBackupRetentionPeriod.Description: The number of days DB backups are retained

ParamNetworkStackName.Description: Name of an active CloudFormation stack that contains the networking / VPC resources

ParamDBNotificationEmail.Description: Email address to send DB notifcations to

ParamDBSnapshotArn.Description: ARN of the RDS Snapshot to create the cluster from

ParamKMSKeyArn.Description:
(Optional) The Key ARN for the KMS used to encrypt / decrypt RDS data at rest.
  Make this key yourself in IAM -> EncryptedKeys.  If not specified, the default account KMS key will be used.
